talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>This appears to be a record of the royal
family that is fairly old...

However, we can safely assume that
anything about the connection between
the Zora and the sky would be far older.
The ruins that <clr:0000>Jiahto <clr:ffff>is looking into
are surely the big catch.
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Thanks for cleaning up the statue in
the square.

I will make note of your achievement and
report it to Lady Yona.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_00>Oh... <sp:5:1:0>I suppose I should record Cleff's
achievement as well.
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Jiahto is on the cliff behind the domain.<sp:5:0:0>
He is on the banks of <clr:0000>Toto Lake<clr:ffff>.

The Upheaval revealed an old ruin, and so
he is investigating it.

It seems Prince Sidon believes that ruin
is the most promising of our prospects.<sp:5:1:0>
Yes...<sp:5:0:0> I can't help but agree.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>If I don't find anything after a bit more
investigating, perhaps I'll join Jiahto...
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Once the sludge disappeared, the ancient
ruins were revealed to be majestically
floating in the sky.
It is like a divine gift to the Zora.<sp:5:1:0> I believe
the message they are sending us is...

<snd:LaughS_00>When you are in turmoil, do not get lost
gazing down into the watery depths,
but rather set your sights skyward.
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat>Yes, <sp:5:0:0>please note that I tackled the sludge
for the sake of my beloved domain.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Tired_00>However... <sp:5:0:0>Please do not mention that I accidentally
used up all of the splash fruit I was selling...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0040: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Tired_01>Next I must examine the ancient books.
talk0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I will make note of your achievement and
report it to Lady Yona.
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I will take a look at the books from
the inn.
talk0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Ancient ruins floating in the sky...<sp:5:1:0>
It is so very mystical, is it not?
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Tired_01>If I am unable to find anything here,
perhaps I should join up with Jiahto.
talk0056:
Hm, though the weather is bad right now.
You can hardly see them.
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>In this shelf, there are texts about
robberies and romances...

Just a bunch of informal literature of
mysterious origins.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>And I must admit...<sp:5:0:0>it is fascinating.
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_01>W-well, safety comes first!


<snd:Tired_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>And I must admit...<sp:5:0:0>I was acting out of fear.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>The texts on this shelf seem like they are
for travelers looking to kill time.

But not even Kayden knows how long
they have been here.

Some of them are quite old, so I may
make some surprising discoveries.
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Cleff used ALL of our splash fruit <sp:5:0:0>and
made it sooo clean...just in front of
the store.
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>The information regarding the sky that
Prince Sidon is looking for...

No... This won't help either.
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>The sludge has disappeared, and a new
king has taken the throne!

A wonderful new page has been added to
the history of the Zora!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>I wish that you could stay forever in our
beautiful domain, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>But as I understand it, you must
be leaving.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>If you ever grow weary during your
journey, <sp:5:0:0>please return to Zora's Domain.
You are always welcome here!
talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I went through most of the books in the
domain. Still...

I can't seem to find the information about
the sky that Prince Sidon is looking for.

I believe our best bet<sp:5:1:0> lies in the ruins that
<clr:0000>Jiahto <clr:ffff>is investigating...
talk0035: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Link...<sp:5:0:0> I pray that your travels are safe.
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>So much has happened that planning for
the new Zora history chronicle is a lot
of work.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>It was frightening when the sludge started
falling, but at least the front of the store
is clean.
You see, <sp:5:0:0>Cleff used the splash fruit <sp:5:0:0>to
clean everything up...just in front of
the store.
<snd:Ease_00>That's right. <sp:5:0:0>He used all the splash fruit
that the store had in stock,<sp:5:0:0> and made it
sooo clean...just in front of the store.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>This document appears to be
relatively recent.

I must examine older texts if I hope to
find information on the sky land that
Prince Sidon is looking for.
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If the phenomena of the world are at rest
now, I would like to go inspect the ruins
in the sky.
Then I might be able to find the evidence
behind this literature. So far, it sounds
like a bunch of fairy tales.
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Now...<sp:5:0:0> I must do my resource hunting
quietly. I do not want to upset Dento.
